lead_paragraph: The Carolina Panthers seem to have improved the team that advanced to last season’s conference championship game. Keyshawn Johnson, acquired in free agency, is an excellent complement to the star Steve Smith at wide receiver. The defensive line, featuring Julius Peppers, Mike Rucker, Kris Jenkins and Maake Kemoeatu, ranks with the best in football.
